title: Large Picture Windows, Sand Volleyball Court, Built-in Microwave
neighborhood: 550 N. Figueroa st., Los Angeles, CA
map_address: 550 N. Figueroa st. near Figueroa st and Cesar Chaves Ave
posting_body: ['Imagine a home where the fine art of living has been perfected.', 'Welcome to The Orsini, home to the best apartments in downtown Los Angeles.', 'From the moment you enter the elegant Mediterranean inspired 2-story foyer at The Orsini, you will realize that you have come home to a new experience in luxury apartment living.', 'We are in the heart of Los Angeles, California and the pulse of extraordinary living.', 'Enjoy a short commute to the LA Fashion District, Staples Center, Disney Concert Hall, Chinatown and all the amazing dining and glamorous shopping that living in Los Angeles has to offer.', 'AMENITIES AND FEATURES', '-Karaoke Lounge', '-Yoga/Dance Studio w/ Large Flat-Screen TV and DVD Player', '-Solid Hardwood Oak Entry Doors', '-Peaceful, Lushly Landscaped Courtyards', '-Individual Apartment Balconies or Patios', '-Two Mail Rooms with Package Acceptance Services', '-Full-Swing Virtual Golf', '-Outdoor', 'Putting Green', '-Dedicated Gated Parking For Residents', '-Spectacular Two-Story Entry Lobby', '-Two 24-Hour State-Of-The-Art Fitness Centers', '-Private Dry Saunas and Steam Rooms', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'WEBSITE', '<URL>', 'ADDRESS', '550 N.
